author: aldcroft
description:
The "How to think like a Computer Scientist" books (web based or 
physical) have long been a recommended starting place for scientists 
learning to code.  This interactive, javascript driven, video laced edition of the Python book just took things to the next level and is a super place to start learning Python:How to think like a Computer Scientists -- Learning 
with Python: Interactive Edition
title: Python interactive tutorial: How to think like a Computer Scientist
